text: وَتِلْكَ ٱلْقُرَىٰٓ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ لَمَّا ظَلَمُوا۟ وَجَعَلْنَا لِمَهْلِكِهِم مَّوْعِدًا

translation.en.sahih: And those cities - We destroyed them when they wronged, and We made for their destruction an appointed time.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan (penduduk) negeri telah Kami binasakan ketika mereka berbuat zalim, dan telah Kami tetapkan waktu tertentu bagi kebinasaan mereka.
